TopicTitle: The reason behind my weird forum personality shift, and what's next for my account.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. You have probably all heard the fact that I am acting weird on the forums. The mud pictures and posts. And, to be honest, I don't really like mud that much. I just wanted to transform for a bit from the star we all know to someone obsessed with mud. I really just wanted to see how it feels to act a bit like someone who likes mud. So, here's the second part: what's next for my account. I am still going to post in the forum games. But it'll be way less mud-themed and way more KSP-themed. More stuff will start happening in my life 3 weeks from Monday. This means I'll have less time to work on a KSP mod project for a quantum vacuum plasma thruster which I just started making. Before the year is out, expect to see that engine's first alpha release. So, that's the plan.

Thanks, Sun.
So I guess there won't be any creepy mud posts from now on? Nice!
At first I thought I caused something. I liked your mud personality,
Good. I thought you were losing your mind.
Well then why not start liking Venusian regolith?
